books.title: Java Essentials
books.summary: This book covers all important aspects of Java programming. It is highly recommended by experienced SWE

books.title: Python for Data Science
books.summary: A comprehensive guide to using Python for data analysis and machine learning. Suitable for beginners and experienced programmers alike.

books.title: JavaScript: The Good Parts
books.summary: Discover the best practices and most effective techniques for writing clean, efficient JavaScript code. A must-read for every JavaScript developer.

books.title: Algorithms Unlocked
books.summary: An accessible introduction to algorithms, covering key concepts with clear explanations and real-world examples. Suitable for students and professionals.
